 alolaścātra jāyeta strīlolaścāpi mānavaḥ
 citraśīlaśca naikatrārpitacittaḥ sa ucyate 
punarvasau
 dhanyam yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ puṣye nityaṃ prayojayet
 sarveṣāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sarvakarmāṇi kārayet
 rājāmātyaṃ prayuñjīta śuśrūṣāṃ vinayaṃ caret
 rājānamabhiṣiñcecca alaṃkuryātsvakāṃ tanum
 śmaśrukarmāṇi kuryācca vapanaṃ nakhalomataḥ
 purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvajāgraṃ ca prakārayet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya mandavarṣaṃ samādiśet
 na ca rogo na cauraśca kṣemaṃ cātra sadā bhavet
 puṣyeṇa nityayuktaḥ san sarvakarmāṇi sādhayet
 vaireṇātropanāhaiśca ye janāstān vivarjayet
 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca mahābhogaḥ prajāyate puṣye
 sidhyate dāruṇaṃ karma āśleṣāyāṃ ca kārayet
 duryādābharaṇānyatra prākāramupakalpayet
 dehabandhaṃ nadībandhaṃ saṃdhikarma ca kārayet
 prabhūtadaṃśamaśakaṃ varṣaṃ mandaṃ ca varṣati
 krodhanaḥ svapnaśīlaśca kuhakaścātra jāyate āśleṣāyām
 maghāsu sarvadhānyāni vāpayetsaṃharedapi
 saṃghātakarma kurvīta sumukhaṃ cātra kārayet
 koṣṭhāgārāṇi kurvīta phalaṃ cātra niveśayet
 sarvadā pitṛdevebhyaḥ śrāddhaṃ caivātra kārayet
 sasyānāṃ bahulībhāvo yadi devo 'tra varṣati
 suhṛcca dvārikaścaiva rasakāmaśca jāyate
 āyuṣmān bahuputraśca strīkāmo bhaktalolupaḥ
 saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate
 dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet maghāsu
 phalgunīṣu ca pūrvāsu saubhāgyārthāni kārayet
 kumārīmaṅgalārthāni snāpanāni ca kārayet
 kanyāpravahanārthāya vihāraṃ caiva kārayet
 veśmāni kārayettatra vaiśyamatra prayojayet
 bhāgam ye copajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet
 avyaktakeśo 'keśaḥ subhagaścātra jāyate
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet
 naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi na tadastīti nirdiśet 
pūrvaphalgunyām
 uttarāyāṃ tu phalgunyāṃ sarvakarmāṇi kārayet
 medhāvī darśanīyaśca yaśasvī cātra jāyate
 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvamastīti nirdiśet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyātsampadanuttamām 
uttaraphalgunyām
 hastena laghukarmāṇi sarvāṇyeva prayojayet
 sarveṣāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sarvakarmāṇi kārayet
 hastyārohaṃ mahāmātraṃ puṣkariṇīṃ ca kārayet
 cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tacca vidvān vivarjayet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya varṣā viśrāvaṇī bhavet
 athātra jātaṃ jānīyācchūraṃ cauraṃ vicakṣaṇam
 kuśalaṃ sarvavidyāsu arogaṃ cirajīvinam haste
 citrāyāmahataṃ vastraṃ bhūṣaṇāni ca kārayet
 rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet
 hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet
 alaṃkuryāttathātmānaṃ gandhamālyavilepanaiḥ
 gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanam
 pūrvikāṃ rūpakārāṃśca rathakārāṃśca śikṣayet
 citrakārāṃśca lekhakān pustakarma ca kārayet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya citravarṣaṃ vinirdiśet
 medhāvī darśanīyaśca citrākṣo bhaktalolupaḥ
 mṛduśīlaśca bhīruśca calacittaḥ kutūhalī
 āyuṣmān subhagaścaiva strīlolaścātra jāyate citrāyām
 svātyāṃ prayojayedyodhān aśvānaśvatarīṃ kharān
 kṣipraṃ gamanīyaṃ bhakṣyaṃ laṅghakānadhvamānikān
 bherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavān murajāṃścopanāhayet
 āvāṃhāśca vivāhāṃśca sauhṛdyaṃ cātra kārayet
 nirvāsanamamitrāṇāṃ svayaṃ na pravasedgṛhāt
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vātavṛṣṭirabhīkṣṇaśaḥ
 medhāvī rogabahulaścalacittaśca jāyate svātau
 lāṅgalāni viśākhāsu karṣaṇaṃ ca prayojayet
 yavagodhūmakarmāntāñ śamīdhānyaṃ ca varjayet
 śālayastilamāṣāśca ye ca vṛkṣāḥ suśākhinaḥ
 ropayettān viśākhāsu gṛhakarma ca kārayet
 śiraḥsnānāni kurvīta medhyaṃ prāyaśca kārayet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyātkalpaparisravam
 manasvī darśanīyaśca medhāvī cātra jāyate
 krodhano 'lpasutaścaiva durbhago bhaktalolupaḥ viśākhāsu
 anurādhāsu kurvīta mitraiḥ sadbhiśca saṃgatim
 sarvāṇi mṛdukarmāṇi mādhuryaṃ cātra kārayet
 kṣauraṃ ca kārayedatra śastrakarmāṇi kārayet
 samyuktāntaprayogāṃśca saṃdhiṃ kuryācca nityaśaḥ
 naṣṭaṃ paryupataptaṃ vā svalpāyāsena nirdiśet
 suhṛnmitrakṛtaścātra dharmaśīlaśca jāyate
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet 
anurādhāyām
 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ pūrvakārī syādrājānaṃ cābhiṣiñcayet
 nagaraṃ nigamaṃ grāmaṃ māpayedārabheta ca
 kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet
 bhrātṛrṇāṃ bhavati jyeṣṭho jyeṣṭhāyām yo 'bhijāyate
 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī
 prāsādamāroheccātra gajamaśvaṃ rathaṃ tathā
 grāmanigamarāṣṭreṣu sthāpayecchreṣṭhinā balam
 naṣṭaṃ paryupataptaṃ vā kleśenaiveti nirdiśet
 dāruṇānyatra sidhyanti tāni vidvān vivarjayet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet 
jyeṣṭhāyām
 mūle tu mūlajātāni mūlakandālukānyapi
 mūlādyāni ca sarvāṇi bījānyatra prayojayet
 ṛṇaṃ vai yatpurāṇaṃ syādartho vāsyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ
 mūle siddhyarthamārabhyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ barāṅgakam
 cikitsitāni yānīha strīṇāṃ dārakakanyayoḥ
 nadīṣu snapanaṃ caiva mūle sarvān prayojayet
 dāruṇānyatra sidhyanti maṅgalāni ca kārayet
 kiṇvayogān surāyogānna kuryācchatrubhiḥ saha
 dhanavān bahuputraśca mūlavānatra jāyate
 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet mūle
 āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaśca sarāṃsi ca
 vāpīkūpaprapāścaiva taḍāgāni ca kārayet
 utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca
 ārāmāṃśca prakurvīta bhaikṣakāṃśca prayojayet
 yāni cogrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyantyatra tu tāni ca
 naṣṭaṃ paryupatāptaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet
 āyuṣmān puṇyaśīlaśca darśanīyo 'tra jāyate 
pūrvāṣāḍhāyām
 uttarasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ vairāṇi na samācaret
 vāyayetsarvavāsāṃsi navaṃ nācchādayediti
 na saṃharedbhedayedvā vāstukarma na sidhyati
 śālākarma gavādīnāṃ grāme grāmaṇinastathā
 śreṇībandhaṃ ca rājā tu samayaṃ cātra kārayet
 pragalbhaśca sabhāśīlaḥ kṛtī cātra prajāyate
 suhṛdāmabhiyogī ca mantrabhāṣye vicakṣaṇaḥ
 naṣṭaṃ vāpyupataptaṃ vā astītyevaṃ vinirdiśet
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet 
uttarāṣāḍhāyām
 abhijiti na kurvīta brahmadevasya hyarcanam abhijiti
 śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ
 gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati
 karṇayorvedhanaṃ kuryādrājānaṃ cābhiṣiñcayet
 dvijātīnāṃ tu karmāṇi sarvāṇyeva prayojayet
 balikṛtyāni kurvīta darśayecca balānyapi
 medhāvyarogī balavān yajñaśīlo 'tra jāyate
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet
 naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravaṇasthe niśākare śravaṇe
 dhaniṣṭhā laghunakṣatraṃ sarvakarmasu pūjitam
 adhītya brāhmaṇaḥ snāyādrājānmabhiṣiñcayet
 sarveṣāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sarvakarmāṇi kārayet
 śreṣṭhinaṃ sthāpayed deśe gaṇādhyakṣaṃ gaṇeṣvapi
 medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahābhogī mahādhanaḥ
 bahvapatyo mṛdurdānto mahātmā cātra jāyate
 naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ praviddhaṃ vā kleśenaivātra labhyate
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyāccātra suvṛṣṭitām 
dhaniṣṭhāyām
 nityaṃ śatabhiṣāyoge bhaiṣajyāni prayojayet
 kīrtikarma ca kurvīta sidhyantyātharvaṇāni ca
 prasārayecca paṇyāni śauṇḍikaṃ ca prayojayet
 udadhiṃ khānayettatra tilamāṣāṃśca vāpayet
 sāmudrikāṇi paṇyāni nāvinaśca prayojayet
 ādeyaṃ ca tadādadyād vyayaṃ cātra na kārayet
 sāṃdhipālān dvārapālāmllekhakāṃśca prayojayet
 bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīt bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet
 nidhiṃ vā khānayettatra nidadhyādapi vā nidhim
 dhanaṃ cātra prayuñjīt bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet
 athātra mṛgayennaṣṭaṃ labhyate taccirādapi
 arogī krodhanaścātra svapnaśīlaśca jāyate
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet 
śatabhiṣāyām
 pūrvabhādrapadāyoge krūrāṇāṃ siddhirucyate
 naṣṭaviddhopataptaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet
 dīrghaśrotro mahābhogo jñātīnāṃ ca sadā priyaḥ
 mahādhano 'krūrakarmā niḥkrodhaścātra jāyate
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya caṇḍāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ samādiśet 
pūrvabhādrapade
 uttarasyāṃ tu kurvīt āyuṣyaṃ puṣṭikarma ca
 na ca dakṣiṇato gacchetpuraṃ cātra pradāpayet
 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca dhanavāṃścātra jāyate
 atrāpi triguṇaṃ vindedādānam yadi vā vyayam
 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭimabhinirdiśet 
uttarabhādrapade
 revatyāṃ ratnarajataṃ dhanadhānyaṃ prayojayet
 koṣṭhāgārāṇi kurvīt kiṇvaṃ cātra na kārayet
 surākarma ca kurvīd dhiraṇyaṃ govrajāni ca
 gosaṃghaṃ sthāpayeccātra gośālāṃ cātra kārayet
 ācchādayennavaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyamapi dhārayet
 bhikṣuko dānaśīlaśca daridraścānasūyakaḥ
 jñātīnāṃ sevako nityaṃ dharmajñaścātra jāyate
 suvṛṣṭiṃ naṣṭalābhaṃ ca revatyāmabhinirdiśet revatyām
 strīpuṃsamaśvinā yuñjādaśvaśālāṃ ca kārayet
 aśvān prayojayedatra rathaṃ cātra prayojayet
 ṛṇaprayogaḥ kartavyo bījānyatra pravāpayet
 yānāni ca hayān damyān dantinaśca prayojayet
 bhaiṣajyaṃ bhojayodatra bhiṣakkarma ca kārayet
 madhāvī darśanīyaśca rājayogyaśca saṃpadā
 ārogī balavāṃcchūraḥ subhago hyatra jāyate
 suvṛṣṭiṃ naṣṭalābhaṃ ca aśvinyāmabhinirdiśet aśvinyām
 tritārāṃ bharaṇīṃ vidyātkrūrakarmāṇi sādhayet
 bhṛtyāṃśca bhṛtakāṃścāpi vṛṇuyāddarśayettathā
 bhṛtiṃ copanayedatra bhāryāṃ ca na vivāhayet
 utkuṭuko vañcanakaḥ kūṭasākṣī ca tandrijaḥ
 vidhijñaḥ pāpacāritraḥ kadaryaścātra jāyate
 jāyate cātra duḥśīlo gurūṇāmabhyasūyakaḥ
 paropatāpī lubdhaśca paravyāhāragocaraḥ bharaṇyām
 saptavīṃśatinakṣatre kṛttikādi yadā bhavet
 bharaṇyantāni ṛkṣāṇīmāṃ pratipādayetkriyām
 teṣāṃ madhye yadā sarve śasyānyoṣadhayo 'pi ca
 vanaspatayaśca pīḍyante yatrāsau tiṣṭhate grahaḥ
 sarvaṃ pratipādayitavyamuktanakṣatrakarmasu
 ukto nakṣatrakarmanirdeśo nāmādhyāyaḥ
 catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāni bhavanti
 tāni vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchṛṇu
 tadyathātrīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ca
 kṣeme 'dhyāvaset
 bījāni cātra ropayet
 niveśanaṃ cātra kalpayet
 rājānaṃ cābhiṣiñcayet
 yāni cānyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet
 atha naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ cāpi hṛtaṃ ca vā
 evamabhinirdiṣṭaṃ vā svasti kṣipraṃ bhaviṣyati
 athātra jāto dhanyo 'sau vidyātmā ca yaśasvī ca
 maṅgalīyo mahābhogī mahāyogī bhaviṣyati
 catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi kṣiprāṇi bhavanti
 tadyathāpuṣyo hastābhijidaśvinī ceti
 eṣu kṣiprāṇi karmāṇi kārayecca vicakṣaṇaḥ
 svādhyāyaṃ mantrasamārambhaṃ pravāsaprasthānaṃ gāśca turaṅgānapyatra yojayet
 dhūryāṇi yuktakarmāṇi coṣadhīkarmāṇi ca
 bhaiṣajyāni sarvāṇyatra prayojayet
 tatra yajñasamārambhaṃ cāturmāsyaṃ ca kārayet
 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā
svasti bhaviṣyatīti vaktavyam
 athātra jātakaṃ vidyānmaṅgalīyam yaśasvinam
 mahābhogaṃ ca rājānaṃ mahāyoginamīśvaram
 mahādhanaṃ mahābhogaṃ tathā ca mahaduttamam
 kṣatriyaṃ dānaśīlaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca purohitam iti
 pañca khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dāruṇāni bhavanti
 tadyathā
 maghā trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ceti pañcamī
 athātra dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā na bhaviṣyati
 iti vaktavyam
 ardharātrikāṇi ṣaṭ
 tadyathāārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā bharaṇī ceti
 navāṃśāḥ ṣaḍgrāsā dvikṣetrāṇi
 rohiṇī punarvasurviśākhā ca
 trīṇi uttarāṇi ceti ubhayatovibhāgāni
 pañcadaśa kṣetrāṇi
 kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā trīṇi pūrvāṇi
 imāni ṣaṭ pūrvabhāgikāni
  mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī aśvinī ceti imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi pañcādbhāgīyāni triṃśanmuhūrtayogāni  
kṣetrāṇi ca 
 api ca brāhmaṇa śubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti
aśubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti
śubhāśubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti
 saṃprayuktanakṣatreṣu sarveṣu yadā śubhamuhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti
tadā śobhanā bhavanti
 yadā aśubhamuhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti
tadā na śobhanā bhavanti
 yadā tu punaḥ śubhāścāśubhāśca samāpattayo
tadā sādhāraṇā bhavanti
 athātra kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhirvā bhavatīti taducyate
 varṣāṇāṃ prathame māse puṣyanakṣatramamāvāsyāṃ bhavati
śravaṇā pūrṇamāsyām
 aṣṭādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 dvādaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 ṣoḍaśāṅgulakāṣṭhasya madhyāhne 'rdhāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 āṣāḍhā rātriṃ nayati
 mṛgaśirasi ādityo gato bhavati
 varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse maghā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
bhādrapadā pūrṇamāsyām
 saptadaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 trayodaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 dvyaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 śravaṇā rātriṃ nayati
 puṣya ādityo gato bhavati
 varṣāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse phalgunyamāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
aśvinī pūrṇamāsyām
 ṣoḍaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 caturdaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 cauraṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 pūrvabhādrapadā rātriṃ nayati
 maghāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 varṣāṇāṃ caturthe māse citrā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
kṛttikā pūrṇamāsyām
 pañcadaśamuhūrto bhavati divasaḥ
 pañcadaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 ṣaḍaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 aśvinī rātriṃ nayati
 phalgunyāmādityo gato bhavati
 hemantānāṃ prathame māse 'nurādhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
mṛgaśirā pūrṇamāsyām
 caturdaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 ṣoḍaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 aṣṭāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 kṛttikā rātriṃ nayati
 citrāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 hemantānāṃ dvitīye māse amāvāsyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhā bhavati
puṣyaḥ pūrṇamāsyām
 trayodaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 saptadaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 daśāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 mṛgaśirā rātriṃ nayati
 viśākhāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 hemantānāṃ tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
maghā pūrṇamāsyām
 dvādaśamuhūrto divase bhavati
 aṣṭādaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 dvādaśāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 puṣyo rātriṃ nayati
 jyeṣṭhāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 hemantānāṃ caturthe māse śravaṇā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
 phalgunī pūrṇamāsyām
 trayodaśamuhūrto divase bhavati
 saptadaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 daśāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 maghā rātriṃ nayati
 āṣāḍhāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 grīṣmāṇāṃ prathame māse uttarabhādrapadā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
citrā pūrṇamāsyām
 caturdaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 ṣoḍaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 aṣṭāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 phalgunī rātriṃ nayati
 śravaṇāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 grīṣmāṇāṃ divitīye māse 'śvinī amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
 viśākhā pūrṇamāsyām
 pañcadaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 pañcadaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 ṣaḍaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 citrā rātriṃ nayati
 uttarāyāṃ bhādrapadāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 grīṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse kṛttikā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
jyeṣṭhā pūrṇamāsyām
 ṣoḍaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 caturdaśamuhūtā rātriḥ
 caturaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 viśākhā rātriṃ nayati
 kṛttikāyāmādityo gato bhavati
 grīṣmāṇāṃ caturthe māse mṛgaśirā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati
uttarāṣāḍhā pūrṇamāsyām
 saptadaśamuhūrto divase bhavati
 trayodaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 madhyāhne dvyaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyāmādityaḥ parivartate
 jyeṣṭhā rātriṃ nayati
 puṣya ādityo gato bhavati
 saṃvatsaramanveṣaṇato muhūrtaviśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvāṇi caitāni nakṣatrāṇi
bhāgānubhāgena amāvāsyāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ ca jujyante
 ūnarātrasya pūrṇarātrasya ca grahītavyam
 tatra tṛtīye varṣe 'dhiko māso yujyate
 ṣaṇṇāṃ māsānāmahorātrāṇi samāni bhavanti
 ataḥ ṣaṇmāsād divaso vardhate
 ṣaṇmāsādrātrirvardhate
 ṣaṇmāsāddivaso māse māse samameva hīyate
 ṣaṇmāsādrātrirmāse māse parihīyate
 ṣaṇmāsādādityaḥ parivartate
 uttarāṃ diśaṃ saṃcarati
 ṣaṇmāsāddakṣiṇāṃ diśam
 ṣaṇmāsātsamudre udakaparimāṇasya hrāso vṛddhiśca bhavati
 sūryagatyā candragatyā ca samudrodakavelābhivṛddhirbhavati
 atra gaṇanāpratijāgaraṇāsmaramityevam
 eṣa saṃvatsaro vyākhyāto bhavati
 candra ādityaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro 'ṅgārako budhaśca ime grahāḥ
 eṣāṃ grahaṇāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ saṃvatsarasthāyī
 evaṃ śanaiścaro budho 'ṅgārakaḥ śukraśceme maṇḍalacāriṇaḥ
 bharaṇī kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā etatsādhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ maṇḍalam
 ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyo 'śleṣā etatsādhāraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalam
 maghā atha phalgunadvayaṃ hastā citrā etatsādhāraṇam tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalam
 svātī viśākhā anurādhā etatsādhāraṇaṃ caturthaṃ maṇḍalam
 jyeṣṭhā mūlāṣāḍhā dvayamatra sarvāṇi mahābhayāni bhavanti
 idaṃ pañcamaṃ maṇḍalam
 abhijicchravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ubhe bhādrapade caitatsādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalam
 revatī aśvinī caitatsādhāraṇaṃ saptamaṃ maṇḍalam
 saṃvatsarameteṣu yadyannakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ pīḍayati
tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā
 dvādaśa muhūrtāni divase dhruvāṇi
dvādaśa rātrau
 ṣaṇmuhūrtāḥ saṃcāriṇaḥ
 katame ṣaṭ nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargodevo raudro vicārī ca
 itīme saṃcāriṇaḥ ṣaṭ
 athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe 'ṣṭādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati
 rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya cāntare madhyāhno bhavati
 sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati
 dvādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati
 ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto rātryavasāne bhavati
 bhādrapade māse pūrṇe saptadaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 madhyāhne 'bhijito nāma muhūrto bhavati
 sūryāvatāre raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati
 trayodaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati
 ardharātre mahābhayo vāyavo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 rātryavasāne ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 āśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
 sūryodaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati
 samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya tvantare madhyāhno bhavati
 sūryāvatāre bhargodevo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 caturdaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati
 abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇārdharātraṃ bhavati
 rātryavasāne ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 kārtike māse pūrṇe divasaḥ samarātrirbhavati
 pañcadaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati
pañcadaśamuhūrtā rātriḥ
 samāne 'horātre sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 saṃmukho nāma muhūrto bhavati madhyāhne
 saṃtato nāma muhūrtaḥ sūryāvatāre
 rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye bhargodevo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 ārdharātre 'bhijinmuhūrto bhavati
 rātryavasāne ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe caturdaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāṃ muhūrto bhavati
 viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasyāntare madhyāhno bhavati
 sūryāvatāre varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 ṣoḍaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ samyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 rākṣasasyābhijitasya ca muhūrtasyāntare 'rdharātraṃ bhavati
 rātryavasāne ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 madhyāhne virato nāma muhūrto bhavati
 sūryāvatāre nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati
 saptadaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 ardharātre rākṣaso nāma muhūrto bhavati
 rātryavasāne ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 māghamāse pūrṇe dvādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati
 sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasyāntareṇa madhyāhno bhavati
 sūryāvatāre vijayo nāma muhūrto bhavati
 aṣṭādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati
 gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya cāntaramardharātraṃ bhavati
 rātryavasāne ātapāgnirevaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati
 yathā śrāvaṇe tathā māghe
 yathā bhādrapade tathā phālgune
 yathā āśvayuje tathā caitre
 yathā kārtike tathā vaiśākhe
 yathā mārgaśīrṣe tathā jyeṣṭhe
 yathā pauṣe tathā āṣāḍhe
 evameteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyam
 nakṣatravicaraṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
 yathāmadhyaṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rātrivaśena divasavaśena cotkarṣāpakarṣau kartavyau
 hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe 'rdhamāse vā
 dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atrāntare divase kalā vardhate
rātrau kalā hīyate
 catvāro mahārājāno dhriyate yairvasuṃdharā
 ativṛddhirviśuddhaśca vardhamānaḥ pṛthakśravāḥ
 mahābhūtāni catvāri kampayanti vasuṃdharām
 āpa indraśca vāyuśca tathāgnirbhagavānapi
 trayastu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaḍekamāse tu bhavanti vegāḥ
 parasya cakrasya nidarśanaṃ syātprakampate yatra mahī tvabhīkṣṇam
 viśākhā daśarātrī syājjeṣṭhā dvādaśarātrikā
 pañcaviṃśatirāṣāḍhā śravaṇā pañcasaptatiḥ
 rātriśataṃ bhādrapade kraturaśvayuje smṛtaḥ
 adhyardhaṃ kārtike māse kraturmārgaśire smṛtaḥ
 pauṣe tu pañcapañcāśanmāghe rātriśataṃ smṛtam
 adhyardhaṃ phalgune māse caitre triṃśattu rātrayaḥ
 vipāko bhūmivegānāmataḥ kampaḥ pravartate
 yadā sarveṣu māseṣu satataṃ kampate mahī
 vṛkṣāstathā calanti sma jalam yadi kampate
 parvataḥ parṇavatkamped bhayamatra vinirdiśet
 nagarāṇyatha vā grāmā ghoṣā ye cātra saṃśritāḥ
 śīghraṃ bhavanti vijanāraṇyabhūtā mṛgāśrayāḥ
 aṭavyaḥ saṃpravartante daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca
 anāvāsā diśo vidyād bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 kṛttikāsu caled bhūmirgrāmeṣu nagareṣu vā
 abhīṣkṇaṃ mucyate hyagnirdahate sa tṛṇālayān
 kṛṣṇāgniraśaneḥ pātaḥ karmārā āhitāśrayāḥ
 agārāśca nivartante saṃvarteneva dhātavaḥ
 ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca taṃ grāmamāśritāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 rohiṇyāṃ calitā bhūmiḥ sarvabījavināśanam
 proptaṃ śasyaṃ na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchratā
 gurviṇīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ garbho nipīḍyate bhṛśam
 durbhikṣavyasanākrāntā tribhāge tiṣṭhati prajā
 mahātmānaśca rājānaḥ śrīmantaśca narottamāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 mṛgaśīrṣe caledbhūmiroṣadhīnāṃ vināśanam
 cikitsakāḥ śrotriyāśca ghaṭakāḥ somayājakāḥ
 somapītāśca ye viprā vānaprasthāśca tāpasāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 ārdrāyāṃ calitā bhūmirvṛkṣā naśyanti kṣīriṇaḥ
 annapānāni naśyanti pathikā daṃṣṭripālikāḥ
 kūpakhāḥ parikhākhāśca pāpakā ye ca taskarāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 punarvasau caledbhūmirmaṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍikāpi ca
 vāgurikāḥ kāraṇḍavāścakriṇaḥ śukasārikāḥ
 arbhakā bhramakārāśca māṃsikāḥ śaṅkhavāṇijāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 puṣyeṇa ca caled bhūmirbrāhmaṇā nāyakāstathā
 dūraṃgamā vāṇijakāḥ sārthavāhāśca ye narāḥ
 pārthivāḥ pārvatīyāśca ye ca tadbhaktigocarāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 śilāvarṣaṃ pravarṣanti śasyānāmanayo mahān
 āśleṣāyāṃ caledbhūmir nāgāḥ sarve sarīsṛpāḥ
 kīṭāḥ pipīlikāḥ śvānā ekakhurāśca ye mṛgāḥ
 vaidyā viṣakarāścāpi ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 maghāsu calitā bhūmirmahārājo 'tra tapyate
 ye ca śrāddhā nivartante samājā utsavāstathā
 yajñāśca devakṛtyaṃ ca sarvamatra nivartate
 ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye cānye 'pyagrapaṇḍitāḥ
 gandharvāśca vinaśyanti narā ye ca mahākulāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 phalgunyāṃ calitā bhūmirṛturvyāvartate tadā
 tiryagvātaścaiva vāti kṛtaṃ naśyati śāśvatam
 pathikāścopatapyanti māṣayācyopajīvikāḥ
 dharme ratā āsanikā ye ca śulkopajīvinaḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 calatyuttaraphalgunyāṃ vaṇijā dvīpayātrikāḥ
 sārthavāhā āsanikā ye ca śilpopajīvinaḥ
 aṅgā videhamagadhā nairṛtāḥ strīparigrahāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 hastena calitā bhūmiḥ kumbhakāracikitsakāḥ
 gaṇamukhyā mahāmātrāḥ senādhyakṣāśca ye narāḥ
 tāramakā nārapaṭā
vipsarah
kauṭikā api
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 citrāyāṃ calitā bhūmiḥ kārukā upakalpakāḥ
 kumāryaḥ sarvaratnaṃ ca sasyānāṃ bījakaiḥ saha
 vaṅgā daśārṇakuravaścedimāhiṣakāstathā
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 svātau pracalitā bhūmiścaurā ye ca kuśīlakāḥ
 hiṃsakā ye ca tatkarmaratābhyarthitamūṣakāḥ
 himavata uttareṇa vāyubhakṣāstapasvinaḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 viśākhāyāṃ caled bhūmirmahāśailakṣayo bhavet
 ugrā vātāḥ pravāntyatra aśmakairakuśalinaḥ
 anurādhe caled bhūmirdasyūnāmanayo mahān
 viṭā dyūtakarāścaiva granthibhedāśca ye narāḥ
 andhrāḥ puṇḍrāḥ pulindāśca bhaye tiṣṭhantyanāśritāḥ
 mitrabhedaśca balavāṃs tadā jagati jāyate
 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ calitā bhūmirmahārāja pratapyate
 vāyasā vṛṣabhā vyāḍāstathā caṇḍamṛgāśca ye
 kuravaḥ śūrasenāśca mallā bāhlīkanigrahāḥ
 pratyarthikena śīghreṇa ye ca tadbhaktibhājanāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 mūlena calitā bhūmiścatuṣpaddvipadāstathā
 grahāśrayāḥ piśācāśca ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 durbhikṣaṃ ca karotyāśu dhānyamalpodakaṃ bhavet
 darīparvatamūlāni gacchanti ca tadā bhuvi
 pūrvāṣāḍhe caled bhūmirjalajā matsyaśuktikāḥ
 śiśumārā udrakāśca nakrā makarakacchapāḥ
 jātigotrapradhānāśca dhanino 'tha vicakṣaṇāḥ
 dvitīyābhijātāśca mahāvidyākarāśca ye
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 uttarasyāṃ caled bhūmiḥ śilpināmanayo mahān
 ayaskārāḥ sthapatayastrapukārāśca takṣakāḥ
 daridrā dhaninaścāpi śilpino vividhā api
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 grāmakūṭāni ca ghnanti sacalasthāvarāṇi ca
 vaiṣṇave calitā bhūmistadeti yadanīpsitam
 adhyāpakāḥ śāstravidaḥ kavayo mantrapāragāḥ
 yugaṃdharāḥ śūrasenā abhirājāḥ paṭaccarāḥ
 kuśaṇḍāḥ śaradaṇḍāśca ye narā rājapūjitāḥ
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ caled bhūmirdhanināmanayo mahān
 maheśvarāstathā mahānāgarāḥ śreṣṭhinastathā
 pracaṇḍāḥ svastimantaśca bhadrakārā yugaṃdharāḥ
 pārikūlāśca bhojyāśca hyanye sannāgarā api
 ete vyasanamarcchanti bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 vāruṇye calitā bhūmiraudakeṣvanayo mahān
 hastino 'śvakharoṣṭrāśca sparśamarcchanti dāruṇam
 tadāsau vīrakān madrān bāhlīkān kekayānapi
 anāśrayāṃścakravākāñ janasthānapi pīḍayet
 sājena calitā bhūmī rākṣasān ghātakāṃstathā
 aurabhrikān saukarikān sauvīrāṃśca nipātayet
 vaṇijyajīvino vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃśca karītīnapi
 yavanān mālavādyāṃśca ganthibhedāṃśca nāśayet
 ahirbudhnye caled bhūmirvaṇijāmanayo mahān
 dharme ratāśca ye siddhā ye ca śauktikakarmiṇaḥ
 śibīn vatsāaṃs tathā vātsyān kṣatriyānārjunāyanān
 sindhurājadhanuṣpāṇīn sarvānardayate 'cirāt
 revatyāṃ calitā bhūmiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ syātsudāruṇaḥ
 grāmaghātāśca vartante grāmo grāmaṃ ca hiṃsati
 naucarānudakājīvān ramaṭhān bharukacchakān
 sudhanvānabhisārāṃśca sarvasenāṃśca nirdahet
 aśvinyāṃ calitā bhūmiraśvānāmanayo mahān
 grāmaghātaśca vartante bhrātā bhrātṛñ jighāṃsati
 yā cātra garbhamādhatte ye ca jātāśca tāniha
 trīṇi varṣāṇyato duḥkhamupaiti ca nirantaram
 sahitāścitragarbhāśca ye hyanye cāṅganājanāḥ
 ārjunāyanā rājanyāḥ suṣṭhu trīṃścāpi hiṃsati
 bharaṇyāṃ calitā bhūmiścaurāṇāmanayo mahān
 viṭā dyūtakarāścaiva granthibhedāśca ye narāḥ
 ādarśacakrāṭā dhūrtāstathā bandhanarakṣakāḥ
 antāvaśāyinaḥ pāpāścaranti ye tu durjanāḥ
 te 'pi tatra vipadyante bhūmicālavicālitāḥ
 vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhavedrūpamanantaram
 saptāhābhyantarāttatra megho bhavati prārthitaḥ
 snigdho hyañjanasaṃkāśo mahāparvatasannibhaḥ
 indraśca vaṣate tatra maharṣervacanam yathā
 eva nigaditaṃ nāthairindraścātra pravarṣati
 svastikākārasaṃkāśā indravajradhvajopamāḥ
 dṛśyante 'bhrā hi saṃdhyāyāṃ grastvā candradivākarau
 tadā nabhasi jāyante meghā dāḍimasaṃnibhāḥ
 lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāttānindrakampitān
 sa nirdeśo bhavettatra maharṣervacanam yathā
 atīva tatra viśvastaḥ sarvabījāni vāpayet
 vyavahārāṃśca kurvīrannirbhayāstatra vāṇijāḥ
 sarveṣāṃ bhūmikampānāṃ praśastā indrakampitāḥ
 vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhavedrūpamanantaram
 saptāhābhyantare tatra meghāḥ saṃchādayennabhaḥ
 tato 'nubaddhā jāyante abhrāḥ kauśeyasaṃnibhāḥ
 anulomaṃ ca samyānti carantaḥ paścimāṃ diśam
 śiśumāraudrakāṇāṃ matsyamakarasannibhāḥ
 dṛśyante 'bhrāśca saṃdhyāyāṃ grastvā candradivākarau
 lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāttāñjalakampitān
 sa nirdeśo bhavettatra maharṣervacanam yathā
 sthaleṣu girikūṭeṣu kṣetreṣūpavaneṣu ca
 sthāpyante tatra bījāni niṃne naśyanti vai tadā
 paṅkenāpi jalenāpi naśyeyū rajasāpi vā
 eteṣāṃ bhūmikampānāṃ praśastā jalakampitāḥ
 vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhavedrūpamanantaram
 saptāhābhyantare tatra vātā vānti sudāruṇāḥ
 dṛśyate kapilā saṃdhyā candrasūryau tu lohitau
 lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānīyādvāyukampitān
 tato bhavati nirdeśo maharṣervacanam yathā
 na tatra pravasetprājña ātmānaṃ cātra gopayet
 guhyamāvaraṇaṃ kuryātprākāraparikhāṃ khanet
 prātisīmā virudhyante narāṇāṃ jāyate bhayam
 eteṣāṃ bhūmikampānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kīrtitā guṇāḥ
 viśeṣeṇa manuṣyāṇāṃ nirmitā vāyukampitāḥ
 kampitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhavedrūpamanantaram
 saptāhābhyantarāttatra ulkāpātāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
 saṃdhyā ca lohitā bhāti candrasūryau tu lohitau
 lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vijñeyā agnikampitāḥ
 agnirdahati kāṣṭhāni rakṣitāni dhanāni ca
 dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśam
 vīṇāśca divi dṛśyante nava māsānna varṣati
 eteṣāṃ bhūmikampānāṃ jaghanyā agnikampitāḥ
 jayati ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃśca hayagajarathamukhyān mantriṇo madhyamāhne
 vyathayati aparāhṇe gopaśūn vaiśyaśūdrān pradahati niśisaṃdhyā taskarānantavāsān
 rajanimiha pradoṣe hiṃsate mlecchasaṃghān striyamapi ca napuṃsaścārdharātreṣvanantān
 kṛṣivaṇigupajīvyān hanti yāme tṛtīye vyathayati surapakṣaṃ raudrakarmāntakṛṣṇe
 pradahati śaśipakṣe yājñikaṃ brahmakṣatra śrapayati śucivṛttāneva dharme pradhānān
 viduṣi ca mṛdubhāvaṃ vindate yo hyadhīte sa bhavati nṛpapūjyo brāhmaṇo vedadarśī
 bṛhaspateśca catvāri samāni śubhakarmaṇā
 catvāri sūryakarmāṇi tulyāni śukrakarmaṇā
 somakarmāṇi catvāri brahmakarma ca tatsamam
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bhūmikampanirdeśo nāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn abhiṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rogotpattiṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 kathayatu bhagavān
 kṛttikāsūtthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 catūrātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 agnirhi devatā tatra dadhnā hyasya baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 rohiṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 pañcarātraṃ bhavedvyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 devaḥ prajāpatistatra śuddhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 vyādhirmṛgaśirobhūtaḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 aṣṭarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 somo hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu baliṃ haret
 anena balidānena tasmādrogādvimucyate
 ārdrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 daśarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 rudro hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 punarvasau bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 aṣṭarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 ādityo devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 puṣye samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 stokakālaṃ bhavettasya pañcarātrādvimucyate
 devo bṛhaspatistatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 āśleṣāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu sarpastatra tu daivataḥ
 maghāsamutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 aṣṭarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 pitaro devatāstatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 pūrvaphālgunijo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 saptarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 aryamā devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucayte
 uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu bhago 'pyatra tu devatā
 hastenāpyutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya va
 pañcarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 ravirhi devatā tatra gandhapuṣpairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 citrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 aṣṭarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtamudgairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 svātyāṃ samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya
 kleśito hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pañcaviṃśatirātrikaḥ
 devatātra bhaved vāyuścitramālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 guruko 'sau bhaved vyādhirahānyekonaviṃśatiḥ
 indrāgnī devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucayte
 anurādhotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 ardhamāsaṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛtapātraṃ baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 jyeṣṭhāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 kleśiko hi bhaved vyādhirahorātratrayodaśa
 indro hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 māsiko hi bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 naiṛtirdevatā tatra madyamāṃsairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 sāṃkleśiko bhaved vyādhiraṣṭau māsānna saṃśayaḥ
 āpo hi devatāstatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 saptarātraṃ bhavet vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 abhijidutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 ṣaṇmāsān saṃbhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 viṣṇuśca devatā tatra dadhimaṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 śravaṇenotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśamāsikam
 viṣṇurhi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 trayodaśadivastatra tataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 pūrvabhadrotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu ahirbudhnyo 'tra daivataḥ
 uttarābhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 saptarātraṃ bhaved vyādhistataścordhvaṃ vimucyate
 aryamā devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 revatyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 mṛduko hi bhaved vyādhiraṣṭāviṃśatirātrikaḥ
 pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 aśvinyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 sāṃkleśiko bhaved vyādhiḥ pañcaviṃśatirātrikaḥ
 gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret
 anena balikarmeṇa tasmādrogādvimucyate
 bharaṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu yamastatra tu daivataḥ
 śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vyādhisamutthāno nāmādhyāyaḥ
 ayaṃ khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhananirmokṣaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 kathayatu bhagavān
 kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti vaktavyaḥ
 rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti
 mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā ekaviṃśatirātreṇa mokṣyatīti
 ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā ardhamāsena mokṣyatīti
 punarvassau ruddho vā baddho vā saptarātreṇa
 puṣye trirātreṇa
 āśleṣāyāṃ triṃśadrātreṇa
 maghāsu ṣoḍaśarātreṇa
 pūrvaphālgunīṣu daśarātreṇa
 viśākhāyāṃ ṣaḍviṃśadrātreṇa
 anurādhāyāmekatriṃśadrātreṇa
 jyeṣṭhāyāmaṣṭādaśarātreṇa
 abhijiti ṣaḍrātreṇa
 pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ caturdaśarātreṇa
 uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ caturdaśarātreṇa
 abhijiti ṣaḍrātreṇa
 śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhādrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ caturdaśarātreṇa
 aśvinyāṃ trirātreṇa
 bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśamāvāpsyatīti vaktavyaḥ
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhananirmokṣo nāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃs tilakādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 kathayatu bhagavān
 mūrdhni tu yasyāstilako 'sti sūkṣmaḥ knigdho bhavet padmasamānavarṇaḥ
 rājā tu tasyā bhavatīha bhartā stanopariṣṭātpratibimbamāhuḥ
 śīrṣe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhavedañjanacūrṇavarṇaḥ
 senāpatistasyā bhaveddhi bhartā stanāntare 'syāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt
 bhruvontare 'syāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti
 pañcaiva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahvannapānaṃ labhate nārī
 gaṇḍasya nāsādikamadhyadeśe bhavecca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ
 tāṃ śokabhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbamāhuḥ
 karṇe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti
 bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt
 yasyottaroṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syāttāṃ bhinnasatyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti
 kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttimūrau tu tasyāstilabimbamāhuḥ
 yasyādharoṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti
 miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt
 cibuke tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti
 miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt
 ayaṃ bho puṣkarasāriṃstilakādhyāyo nāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrajanmaguṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 kathayatu bhavāṃs triśaṅko
 kṛttikāsu naro jātastejasvī priyasāhasaḥ
 bhavecchūrastathā caṇḍaḥ priyavādī ca mānavaḥ
 rohiṇyāṃ puruṣo jāto dhanavān dhārmikastathā
 vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ cāsya sadā sukham
 jāto mṛgaśire yastu mṛduḥ saumyastu mānavaḥ
 darśanīyo bhaveccāsau strīkāntastu viśeṣataḥ
 ārdrājātastu hiṃsātmā caṇḍaḥ paramajalpakaḥ
 raudrakarmā bhaveccāsāvīśvaraśca śatairmahān
 jātaḥ punarvasau yastu hyalolo buddhimānnaraḥ
 dharmaśīlo bhaveccāsau jātakrodhaśca mānavaḥ
 puṣyeṇa puruṣo jātastejasvī brāhmaṇo bhavet
 kṣatriyaśca bhavedrājā vaiśyaśūdrau ca pūjitau
 śvasanaḥ krodhanaḥ krūto hyāśleṣāsambhavo naraḥ
 durmanuṣyaśca caṇḍaśca iti sarvamihādiśet
 bahuprajñaḥ śrāddhakaro bahubhāgyastathaiva ca
 dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet
 pūrvaphālgunījātastu yaḥ kaścitpuruṣo bhavet
 adharmabuddhiśīlaśca gurudārābhimardakaḥ
 uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān
 divyajñānaśca vijñāne puruṣaḥ subhago bhavet
 haste jātaśca śuddhātmā vikrānto mṛdubhojanaḥ
 senāpatyaṃ ca kurute 'steyakarmā bhavedasau
 catrāsu jātaścitrākṣastathā citrakathākaraḥ
 darśanīyo bahustrīkaścitraśīlo bhavennaraḥ
 svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuślāghī vicakṣaṇaḥ
 mṛdukaḥ pānaśauṇḍaśca mitrakārī vicāravān
 viśākhāsu naro jātastejasvī dravyavān mahān
 śūro vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaśca bhavedasau
 anurādhodbhavo martyo mitravān saṃgrahī naraḥ
 śuciścaiva kṛtajñaśca dharmātmā ca bhavecca saḥ
 jyeṣṭhāsu puruṣo jāto mitravānabhijāyate
 dhanurvedābhirāmaśca nārīṣu kurute manaḥ
 mūleṣu puruṣo jāto 'kṛtajñaḥ syādadhārmikaḥ
 dṛḍho vīro bhaveccāsau kilbiṣī ca sa mānavaḥ
 āṣāḍhāsu ca pūrvāsu matsarī calitendriyaḥ
 matsyamāṃsapriyaścāpi ghātakaḥ syātsa mānavaḥ
 sānukrośaśca dātā ca vidyāniṣṭhaḥ suhṛjjanaḥ
 viśvadaive naro jāto bhavedapi ca niścitaḥ
 ācāryaḥ śāstrakartā ca viścvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ
 śravaṇe jāta āyuṣmāñ śrīmāṃśca puruṣo bhavet
 anavasthitacittaśca citradravyaśca mānavaḥ
 dhaniṣṭhāsu bhavejjātaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśaṅkitaḥ
 vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ
 puruṣo dveṣaśīlaśca parivādī ca sarvaśaḥ
 jāto bhādrapadāyāṃ tu pūrvasyāmiha mānavaḥ
 cāritraguṇayuktaśca kṛtajño mukharastathā
 uttarasyāṃ naro jāto bhaviṣyati vicakṣaṇaḥ
 medhāvī bahvapatyaśca dharmaśīlo mahādhanaḥ
 revatyāṃ puruṣo jāto dharmātmā jñātisevakaḥ
 daridro 'lpadhano nityaṃ dāyako nānasūyakaḥ
 aśvinyāṃ puruṣo jāto bhavatyativicakṣaṇaḥ
 mahājanapriyaścāpi śūraśca subhagaśca saḥ
 bharaṇyāṃ puruṣo jātaḥ pāpācāro 'vicakṣaṇaḥ
 kandarpe dātukāmaśca parataścopajīvakaḥ
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrajanmaguṇo nāmādhyāyaḥ
 paṭha bhostriśaṅko utpātacakraṃ nāmādhyāyam
 kathayati ca
utpātacakranirdeśaḥ
 aṣṭāviṃśatiparyantakṛtsne nakṣatramaṇḍale
 divyā vikārā dṛśyante sūryacandragrahādiṣu
 māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivo yadi
 dhūmavṛṣṭirhi āditye udayati pradṛśyate
 vidyuto vātha dṛśyante tadā vidyājjanakṣayam
 aśvinyāamarkato dhūmo nirgacchannapi cchādayet
 anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā vidyātpūrṇavarṣāṇi dvādaśa
 bharaṇyāṃ māghamāse tu pītasūryo 'tha dṛśyate
 samantādvadhyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣamādiśet
 phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu āditye parikho yadi
 naśyanti karvaṭāstatra yadi devo na varṣati
 caitramāse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇaṃ pradṛśyate
 acirodayakāle tu kṣitipālo 'varudhyate
 vaiśākhamāse cārdrāyāmādityaḥ pratisūryakaḥ
 saṃgrāmaṃ tatra jānīyādubhau ghātyete pārthivau
 gṛhyetāṃ candrasūryau vā jyaiṣṭe bharaṇijyeṣṭhayoḥ
 sāmātyo vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre durbhikṣamādiśet
 āṣāḍhe ca yadāditye pūrvabhādrapade sthite
 sāyāhne dṛśyate 'tyarthaṃ lohito maṇḍale vraṇaḥ
 paracakreṇa tadrāṣṭraṃ ṣaṇmāsān pīḍyate tadā
 kṣitipālaśca sāmātyaḥ putradāreṇa vadhyate
 pūrvāyāṃ cottarāṣāḍhāyāmāṣāḍhe gṛhyate śaśī
 vidyād durbhikṣakalaharogāṃścātra vinirdiśet
 māse 'tha śrāvaṇe mūle candrasūryau na bhāsataḥ
 sphuliṅgāścātra dṛśyante vidyādrogabhayaṃ mahat
 māse 'śvayuji gṛhyetāmekapakṣendubhāskarau
 rājaputrasahasrāṇāṃ tadā jāyet saṃkṣayaḥ
 alakṣaṇo niḥprakāśaḥ pūrṇamāsyāṃ tu kārtike
 candrasūryāvagnivarṇau raktavarṇe nabhastale
 ravivadbhāti tadrāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta punaḥ punaḥ
 rājñāṃ vidyāddhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
 bharaṇyaṃ māghamāse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ
 chādayeccandrasūryau tu śīghraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati
 māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutam
 vadhyante pūrvarājānaḥ pratiṣṭhante tathāpare
 sahādityena candre 'tha yadā kaścid grahaścaret
 vāyurvā viṣamo vāti vidyādrājavadhaṃ tadā
 aśanyulke tu vaiśākhe ādityena sahotthite
 ṣaṇmāsābhyantareṇātha rāṣṭre vyasanamādiśet
 jyeṣṭhamāse yadādityo grahato nirgato bhavet
 ādityasyopaghātena grahāḥ sarve 'tha pīḍitāḥ
 jyeṣṭhe ca pāṃśuvarṣeta ādityaḥ pariviṣyate
 kṣitipālasahasrāṇāmeka ekastu vadhyate
 āṣāḍhe vāyavo vānti gacchanto bharaṇīsthitāḥ
 udapānāti śuṣyante sarvaśasyaṃ ca puṣyati
 śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhastalam
 bhayaṃ tatra vijānīyātsamantāt samupasthitam
 śrāvaṇe varṣate hyagniḥ pūrvabhādrapade divā
 meghāḥ śabdamutkurvanti rogadurbhikṣamādiśet
 yadā bhādrapade māse nabhaḥ syācchannagarjitam
 paracakraṃ tadā rāṣṭre harate dhanasaṃcayam
 aśvayuji vātavṛṣṭiḥ syādāgatyottarāṃ diśam
 pātayeccaivamāghātaṃ kṛtsnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati
 kārtike śuklatrayodaśyām yadā candre dhanurbhavet
 samantānnaśyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣamādiśet
 ulkāpātā hyaśanayo māghamāse bhavanti vā
 aśvinyāṃ viṣaye tatra prajā śvāsena vadhyate
 māse tu phālgune yatra agnivarṣaṃ nabhastalāt
 bhavecchabdastadākāśe tadrāṣṭraṃ naśyate laghu
 svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vātavarṣitam
 dṛśyatendradhanuḥ kṣipraṃ nagaraṃ tadvinaśyati
 bharaṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhamāse tu śabda uttarato bhavet
 pītavarṇaṃ tadākāśaṃ paracakrabhayaṃ bhavet
 āṣāḍhe māsi puṇye 'tha dṛśyante vyoṃni vidyutaḥ
 satṛṇodakavṛṣṭibhistribhāgaṃ mucyate prajā
 śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati
 dṛśyatendradhanustatra kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahadbhayam
 māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau
 sukṛcchrā vāyavo vānti mahadrogabhayaṃ tadā
 māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ
 kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu tadā prajā
 bharaṇyāmaśvayuje śabda upariṣṭādbhavedyadi
 satṛṇaṃ cotsṛjetpāṃśu tāpasānāṃ mahadbhayam
 kārtike tu yadārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrūyeta bhairavaḥ
 catuṣpadaḥ kārṣakāṇāṃ mṛtyuṃ tatra vinirdiśet
 mārgaśīrṣe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ tūryaśabdo 'mbare bhavet
 vātāturastadā rāṣṭre vyādhirbhavati dāruṇaḥ
 pauṣamāse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ
 abhīkṣṇaṃ viṃdyudākāśe paṇḍitānāṃ mahadbhayam
 māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyedvasuṃdharām
 jānīyāttṛtīye varṣe sakalaṃ rāṣṭravibhramam
 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ phālgune māse kṛṣṇavāyuḥ samākulaḥ
 abhīkṣṇaṃ kampate bhūmirbrahmacāribhayaṃ tadā
 pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ tu caitre kampetkṣitirdivā
 tasmin varṣe ca tadrāṣṭre parasainyānmahadbhayam
 pūrvāyāṃ cedāṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet
 asibhirhanyate rājā hanyate ca mahājanaḥ
 vaiśākhe kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe hyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ
 anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet
 jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kampedvasuṃdharā
 vidyādyodhasahasrāṇāṃ mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
 jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate
 pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet
 āṣāḍhe kampate bhūmiḥ puṣyanakṣatrasaṃsthite
 śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate
 prakampante yadā caityā ārdrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā
 jvaleyuḥ prapateyurvā naśyedrāṣṭraṃ tadā laghu
 caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca
 sarāṣṭraḥ kṣitipastatra nacirānnāśamarcchati
 śrāvaṇe kampate bhūmiḥ pūrvabhādrapadāsthite
 sadā parājito rājā caurai rāṣṭre ca vadhyate
 kārtike kṣitikampena yadā caityaṃ viśīryate
 dvāraṃ vā nagarasyātha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā
 vāme vā dakṣiṇe cendoḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ
 mahābhogā vinaśyeyuḥ prakāśāḥ pṛthivīśvarāḥ
 sūryācandramasoḥ śṛṅge lohitāṅgo yadāruhet
 śrūrākṣamantrikātpīḍāṃ pratyantānāṃ vinirdiśet
 śanaiścaro yadā śṛṅge somasyābhiruhettadā
 jñeyaṃ rogabhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet
 rāhuṇā nigṛhītastu colkayā hanyate śaśī
 ṣaṇmāsābhyantarāttatra rājño vyasanamādiśet
 yasya caivātha nakṣare śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate
 rāhuṇā kṣitipo rājyaiḥ saha pīḍāmavāpnuyāt
 rājño vai cātha nakṣatre candraṃ keturyadā viśet
 pratyantarājabhiḥ sārdhaṃ śastramūrcchāṃ vinirdiśet
 candramadhyagataḥ śukraḥ phālgunyātha maghā yadā
 sarvadhānyāni śuṣyeyustadā rogaṃ vinirdiśet
 bṛhaspatiśca śukraśca lohitāṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ
 likhyanti somaśṛṅgasya tadā vidyānmahadbhayam
 dhūmaketurmahābhāgaḥ puṣyamāruhya tiṣṭhati
 caturdiśaṃ tadā vidyātparacakraiḥ prābhavam
 maghāyāṃ lohitāṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ
 tiṣṭhetsaṃvatsarastrīṇi bhayaṃ vidyātsamāgatam
 tiṣṭhecchukro 'tha rohiṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana
 vyākuryānniyatamatra kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahadbhayam
 viśākhāyāṃ samīpasthau bṛhaspatiśanaiścarau
 somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ paracakrabhayaṃ tadā
 kākāḥ śyenāśca gṛdhrāśca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā
 maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇastadā
 śyeno hastinivāse vā abhirohetpunaḥ punaḥ
 paracakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhaveccāpi punaḥ punaḥ
 kanyā prasūyate yatra caturhastā catuḥstanī
 strīṇāmeva bhavettatra maraṇaṃ hyatidāruṇam
 garbhasthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca
 tasya deśasya jānīyādvināśaṃ samupasthitam
 ekapādāṃstripādāṃśca caturaṅgāṃstathaiva ca
 nāryo yatra prasūyante rājño vyasanamādiśet
 sūyante vikṛtān garbhān saṃtānān bhayavyañjanān
 pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati
 laghuhastaśīrṣamukhān mānuṣaṃ kāyamāśritān
 pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati
 kharāśca mahiṣāścāpi paśavo 'tha tathāvidhāḥ
 dvitriśīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati
 śṛgālaśvānamakarahayarūpāśca mānavāḥ
 jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati
 pādāvubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate
 deśasya vilayaṃ brūyātparacakreṇa dāruṇam
 pūrvārdhaḥ pakṣinarayorgarbho yatra prasūyate
 rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati
 kumbhāṇḍo jāyate yatra dvimukho 'tha caturmukhaḥ
 trinetrastrimukho vāpi vidyāttatra mahadbhayam
 saukareṇa tu vaktreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣam yadi
 sūtaṃ caturdiśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāttatra na saṃśayaḥ
 ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate
 vibhramātsakalaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vināśamupagacchati
 uttānaśāyī bālastu deśe yatra dvijottamaḥ
 dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyati
 kukṣiṃ bhittvā yadā bālo garbhānniṣkramate svayam
 atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu
 garbhasthāḥ sūkarā uṣṭrāḥ sarpāśca śakunistathā
 strīṇāṃ garbhātprasūyante deśe tu bhayamādiśet
 pauruṣaṃ gārdabhaṃ cātha saukaraṃ cārthavigraham
 gāvo yatra prasūyante nirdiśedbhayamāgatam
 nārī gṛhṇāti garbhaṃ vā adṛṣṭastanarūpiṇī
 vināśaṃ tasya deśasya sanṛpasya vinirdiśet
 jaṭī dīrghanakho yatra sukṛṣṇaḥ paruṣacchaviḥ
 sa jano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet
 agrīvā dantasahitā jāyante yatra bālakāḥ
 śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaśca vilayaṃ vrajet
 ekabāhuraśīrṣo 'tha garbho yatra prasūyate
 svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tadrāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ
 phale phalam yadā paśyetpuṣpe vā puṣpamāśritam
 garbhāḥ sraveyur nārīṇām yuvarājaśca vadhyate
 akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca
 latā gulmo 'tha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet
 vṛkṣopariṣṭātpaśyedvā sravantamātmaśoṇitam
 kūjamānaṃ pataṅgaṃ vā tadā vidyānmahadbhayam
 vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate
 caturvarṇabhayaṃ tatra kalikarma ca jāyate
 puṣpyeyuḥ pādapā yatra vividhāḥ puṣpajātayaḥ
 kalpavṛkṣaprakṛtayastato vidyānmahadbhayam
 anāvartam yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cāpi pradṛśyate
 vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet
 sthānāsthānaṃ gatā vṛkṣā dṛśyeyuryatra kutracit
 pūrvapratiṣṭhito rājā nacireṇa vicālyate
 daivāsuraṃ ca saṃgrāmaṃ paśyedadbhutadarśanam
 śastraṃ mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiścāpi pūrvavat
 kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate
 paracakrāttadā vidyādatyarthaṃ tatparājayam
 devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca
 aśrūṇi pātayeyurvā tadā vidyānmahadbhayam
 devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā
 caleyurathavā yatra kṣitipo 'nyo bhavettadā
 śivaliṅgam yadā kampedgagane vātha dṛśyate
 nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rājavadho bhavet
 pratimāḥ parivartante dhūmāyante rudanti ca
 prasvidyeyuḥ pradhāveyuranyo rājā bhaviṣyati
 acalo vā caletsthānāccalaṃ vāpyacalaṃ bhavet
 amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ cātra nirdiśet
 vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa
 ayuktā vā pravartante kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahadbhayam
 varṣate kusumam yatra raktabindumathāpi vā
 prāṇino vividhān vāpi vidyāccaurabhayaṃ tadā
 yūpāḥ purāṇā nigamā devāgārāṇi cetiyāḥ
 nagarāṇyatha dhūmyante kṣipraṃ rājā vinaśyati
 indurvā dīpavṛkṣo vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate
 rājyakāmaḥ kumāro vā kṣubhyedviṭapako 'pi vā
 antaḥpure yadā nīḍaṃ kurvate madhumakṣikāḥ
 astraṃ vāpi gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanamādiśet
 patedantaḥpure vidyud vṛkṣo vāpyāśrame tathā
 puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā
 prākāre vāyudhāgāre gopurāsthānakeṣu vā
 vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sāmātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ
 anāhatebhyastūryebhyaḥ svayaṃ śabdo viniścaret
 svacakrakṣobhadoṣeṇa sarvaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vilupyate
 māsaśoṇitavarṣaṃ vā patrapuṣpaphalāni vā
 yadābhivarṣettadvarṣaṃ cakrai rāṣṭraṃ vilupyate
 madhuphāṇitapuṣpāṇi gandhavarṣāṇyathāpi vā
 diśo dāhāśca dṛśyeyurmāradurbhikṣalakṣaṇam
 meghaḥ samantato garjedupavarṣetsacātakam
 śoṇitaṃ sakarakaṃ syāttadā vidyātparādbhayam
 vidyucca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇam
 gandharvanagaraṃ cātha dṛṣṭvā vidyānmahadbhayam
 śaśī śoṇitasaṃkāśo madhye kṛṣṇo vivarṇavān
 sāmantakena pīḍyate vidyādrāṣṭre mahadbhayam
 pradīpitāgnisaṃkāśo yadā dṛśyeta candramāḥ
 gaganaṃ dahyate tatra lokapīḍā jvareṇa ca
 yadā gairikasaṃkāśaḥ kṣipramevopaśāmyati
 varṣaṇasyāgamo vidyādyadi vāyuḥ pravāyate
 saṃdhyāyāṃ dhūmravārṇāyāṃ dṛśyetenduśca bhāskaraḥ
 vicchinno brahmarūpeṇa varṣaṃ tatra vinirdiśet
 nāpsu majjati nāpyagnau pūrvavacca na dṛśyate
 agnirutpatsyate tatra koṣṭhāgāraṃ daheta saḥ
 dhvajāgre vāyaso yatra lambapakṣo vidhāvate
 udakaṃ saṃharetkṣipramagnitaḥ sumahadbhayam
 jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayam
 anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahadbhayam
 puradvāre yadāgacchetsvayamāraṇyako mṛgaḥ
 cakradvaye 'pi durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet
 triśīrṣaḥ pañcaśīrṣo vā yadā sarpo 'tha dṛśyate
 anāvṛṣṭyā tadā vidyātsarvaśasyaṃ vinaśyati
 kuśūlo yatra dṛśyeta kampayastu vasuṃdharām
 koṣṭhāgārāṇi naśyeyurye cānye dhanasaṃcayāḥ
 sarpa udyataśīrṣastu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha
 cakradvayādrogataśca vidyāttatra mahadbhayam
 bila ekatra bahavaḥ sarpāḥ supariveṣṭitāḥ
 śastramṛtyuṃ tadā vidyāt kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahadbhayam
 niścarantyavadhānena khaḍgāḥ prajvalitā yadā
 tatastaṃ nacirātpaśyetsaṃgrāmaṃ pratyupasthitam
 kākaḥ śyenaśca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani
 ṣaṇmāsābhyantare rājā mriyate sapurohitaḥ
 prāsādāśca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca
 mahābalaṃ ca vadhyeta rāṣṭrasya rājapālakaḥ
 vajroddhṛtā diśaḥ sarvāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdiśam
 varṣeyuḥ śoṇitam yatra kṣitipālo 'tra vadhyate
 sūryasyodayakāle tu maholkā nipatedyadā
 rājaputrāshasrāṇāṃ bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
 vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyurmucyeyustvaco vā tathā
 sarvasminneva rāṣṭre tu vidyācchatrubhayaṃ mahat
 dine hyulkāprayuktirvā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate
 raktotpādaṃ tadā vidyātsaṃgrāmaṃ bhīmadarśanam
 asiṃ prajvalitaṃ praśyettomaraṃ cakrameva ca
 vidyātpaśyanti śastrāṇi saṃgrāmaṃ bhīmadarśanam
 dīrghamucchvasate vāśvah aśrūṇi ca nipātayet
 pādena karṣate śīghram yuddhe rājavadho dhruvam
 kākaśced gṛhamāruhya hā putra iti vāśati
 sarvaḥ praṇaśyate deśo nagaragrāmakarvaṭaḥ
 anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā
 vināśaṃ tasya deśasya niyamācchīghramādiśet
 āravanti yadā ghoraṃ meghā vṛkamṛgāstathā
 vināśaṃ tasya deśasya vidyācchīghramupasthitam
 chinnasrotā bhavennadyaścirakālavahā api
 gṛhāḥ śūnyodakenāpi śuṣkāstatra bhayaṃ bhavet
 pratisrotā yadā nadyo vahantyaprativāritāḥ
 nityodvignā janapadā nirdiśecca janakṣayam
 dhanūṃṣyākṛṣyamāṇāni dhūmāyanti jvalanti ca
 anyadvāpi praharaṇaṃ parebhyo jāyate bhayam
 mayūragrīvasaṃkāśaḥ pariveśo niśākare
 vidyādrājasahasrāṇāṃ mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
 narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca ratiharṣo na jāyate
 sarvatra śokacintā vā mahattatra bhayaṃ bhavet
 nirgranthā ṛṣayaḥ santo deśātprakrameyuryataḥ
 nadīṃ bhittvā nikuñjān vā sa deśo naśyate 'cirāt
 yatrauṣadhyaśca virasā jalaṃ ca parihīyate
 vidyāddeśaṃ tamutsṛṣṭaṃ devatāṛṣisādhubhiḥ
 matsyāḥ kūrmāśca sarpāśca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ
 dhanaskandhaḥ striyāstatra sapatnairvipralopsyate
 apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā
 dṛśyeyuḥ paracakreṇa dhanaskandho vilopsyate
 mahāpatho yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtairapatho bhavet
 sagrāmakarvaṭaṃ rāṣṭraṃ putreṇa saha naśyati
 nānotpātacakranirdeśo nāmādhyāyaḥ
 paṭha bhostriśaṅko puruṣapinyādhyāyam
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavānatha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣapinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 kathayatu bhagavān
 aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi prakīrtitāni
yāni candrasūryaniḥsṛtānyanuvahanti
 tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgalapramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ dairdhyeṇa jñātavyam
 ekākṣagṛṣṭiḥ śīrṣamūrdhni ekapādatalaṃ bhavet
 caturdaśagṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padam yatra saṃdṛśyante
tadanyathā na bhavati
 nakṣatre yatra yo jātastatra tatra saṃdṛśyate
 puruṣapinyaḥ
 kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai caturaṅgalaḥ
 pinyo dakṣiṇato yasya lomaśaḥ kṛṣṇalohitaḥ
 bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ piṇḍato jvalati śriyā
 kṛttikāsvatha jātasya bhavatyetaddhi lakṣaṇam
 dṛśyate vraṇa evāyam yasya vai caturaṅgalaḥ
 rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so 'pi vidvān dharmarataḥ sadā
 maṇḍito bhogasampanno hrīyuktaścāpi sarvataḥ
 śūro vijayasampanno nityaṃ śatrupramardakaḥ
 grīvāyāmardhagṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate
 mṛgaśīrṣe hyasau jātaḥ śūro bhogasamarpitaḥ
 ardhadvitīyagṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu
 ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaśca saḥ
 vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaścaiva punarvasau
 dhanadhānyasamṛddho hi jāyate svalpamedhasaḥ
 tathaiva puṣye jāto 'sau dṛśyate varalakaṇaḥ
 cakramadhye ca haste ca sūryaścandro virājate
 ardhapradakṣiṇāvartāḥ keśāḥ sarve hi saṃsthitāḥ
 parimaṇḍalaśca kāyena jitakleśo 'pi nāyakaḥ
 hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syādāśleṣāyāṃ kalipriyaḥ
 duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhirataśca saḥ
 adha urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate
 maghāyāṃ dhanavāñ jāto mahātmā dhārimiko naraḥ
 nābhyāṃ dakṣiṇavāmābhyāṃ vraṇo yasya pradṛśyate
 pūrvaphālgunījāte 'sau matsarī cālpajīvitaḥ
 caturaṅgulato nābhyā yasya pinyaḥ pradṛśyate
 uttaraphālgunījāto bhogaśīlaḥ śrutodyataḥ
 śroṇyāmalohitaḥ pinyo haste jātasya dṛśyate
 cauraḥ śaṭhaśca māyāvī mandapuṇyo 'lpamedhasaḥ
 vyañjane yasya pinyastu dṛśyate niyamena hi
 citrājātaḥ sa cedrogī nṛtyagītaratastathā
 vyañjane 'pi ca ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate
 jātaḥ svātyāmasau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hyapaṇḍitaḥ
 kugṛṣṭyā yasya ūrubhyāṃ pinyo lohita eva hi
 ākīrṇo naranārībhirviśākhāyāṃ bhaṭo 'graṇīḥ
 vidvāñ śūro jitāmitro nityaṃ saukhyaparāyaṇaḥ
 śriyā dhṛtyā ca saṃpanno 'cyutaḥ svarupapadyate
 dvitīyagṛṣṭyāmūrubhyāmaṅge yasya pradṛśyate
 śīlavānanurādhāyāṃ dharmabhogasamanvitaḥ
 adho yasyeha corubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate
 alpāyurapriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇastathā
 jānubhyāmūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasyeha dṛśyate
 mūlena bhāgyavāñ jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayellaghu
 pūrvāṣāḍhāsu jātasya pinyaḥ syājjānumaṇḍale
 dāyako dharma āsaṅgyacyutaḥ svargaparāyaṇaḥ
 uttarāyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ jātasya tilakastrike
 yadi dṛśyetsa medhāvī bhogavānsyājjanapriyaḥ
 dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā
 satyapriyastathārogo 'cyutaḥ svargaṃ ca gacchati
 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyām yasya pinyaḥ pradṛśyate
 krodhano mandarāgaśca prājño bhogavivarjitaḥ
 dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate
 mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hyudakena saḥ
 adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ
 paropatāpako mūrkho daridraścaura ityapi
 kugṛṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syājjāto bhādrapadottare
 dānaśīlaḥ smṛtiprāpto dayāpanno viśāradaḥ
 ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate
 revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa bhavatyapi
 aṅguṣṭhavivare pinyo nīlo yasya pradṛśyate
 arogo balavānnityamaśvinyāṃ jāta eva saḥ
 atha pāṇitale pinyo bharaṇyāmakṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ
 vadhyaghātaśca duḥśīlaḥ syānnarakaparāyaṇaḥ
 nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ hyetadyena caryā prajāyate
 etaddhi lokaprajñānaṃ loko yatra samāśritaḥ
 iti pinyādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuh
 piṭakādhyāyaḥ
 ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvasthānagataṃ punaḥ
 strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarvakarmakam
 lābhālābhaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
 prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatām
 tatrābhighātadagdhā vā tilāstadrūpakā api
 visphoṭavarṇabhedāśca piṭakābhihitāḥ smṛtāḥ
 śvetavarṇena piṭako viprāṇāṃ pūjito bhavet
 kṣatopamaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ vaiśyānāṃ pītakaḥ smṛtaḥ
 śūdrāṇāmasitaḥ śreṣṭho vivarṇo mlecchajātiṣu
 yadā savarṇapiṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ
 śīrṣe tu dhanadhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca
 upaghātaṃ bhruvorvidyātstrīlābho bhruvasaṃgame
 akṣisthāne tu piṭakaḥ karoti priyadarśanam
 akṣibhrūbhāge śokāya gaṇḍe putravadho dhruvam
 aśrupāto dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ
 karṇapīṭhe vibhūṣāya nāsāvaṃśe tu jātaye
 nāsāgaṇḍe putralābhaṃ vastralābhaṃ dhruvaṃ vadet
 nāsāgre jāte nāpnoti gandhabhogānabhīpsitān
 uttaroṣṭhe tathādhare cānnapānaṃ śubhāśubham
 cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ
 gale tu dānamāpnoti pānamābharaṇāni ca
 śiraḥsaṃdhau ca grīvāyāṃ śiraśchedanamādiśet
 jāto 'yaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhanakṣayaḥ
 bhaikṣacaryā bhavetsaṃdhau hṛdaye priyasaṃgamaḥ
 pṛṣṭhe tu duḥkhaśayyāyai annapānakṣayāya ca
 pārśve tu sukhaśayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā
 jātena śivamāpnoti na cāpriyasamāgamaḥ
 bāhvoḥ śatruvināśāya yuktaṃ strīlābha eva ca
 dadātyābharaṇaṃ jātaḥ prabāhvoḥ kūrpare kṣudhā
 maṇibandhe niyamanamaṃsābhyāṃ harṣa eva ca
 saubhagaṃ dhanalābhaṃ ca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca
 puṣpito hyekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca
 jātena hṛdi jānīyād bhrātṛputrasamāgamam
 jaṭhare somadānāya nābhyāṃ strīlābhamādiśet
 jaghane vyasanaṃ vidyānnāryā dauḥśīlyameva ca
 putrotpattistu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā
 pṛṣṭhānte sukhabhāgitvaṃ sphici cāpi dhanakṣayaḥ
 ūrujātāśca piṭakā dhanasaubhāgyadāyakāḥ
 jānau śatrubhayaṃ vidyāttathaiva ca dhanakṣayam
 jānusaṃdhau vijānīyānmeḍhrake hyatha jātakaiḥ
 vijayaṃ jñānalābhaṃ ca putrajanma vinirdiśet
 strīlābhaṃ vakṣasi caiva bhavedanyo nirarthakaḥ
 jaṅghāyāṃ parasevā tu paradeśāttu bhujyate
 maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvam
 paribādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ
 pārśve gulphe ca jānīyācchastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvam
 aṅgulīṣu dhruvaṃ śoko vyādhiścāṅguliparvasu
 pravāsaṃ pravasennityaṃ tathaivottarapādake
 yasya pādatale jātastathā hastale 'pi ca
 dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni cāpnuyāt
 snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalam
 sthānasthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayam
 vivarṇo viparītaśca phalaṃ sarvaṃ prayacchati
 puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāśca deśe dakṣiṇataśca ye
 tathā cābhyantare caiva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ
 strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrānteṣu ca parvataḥ
 tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānāṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca
 sthānāsthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatimeva ca
 ādiśettu naraḥ paścādyathaivaṃ samudāhṛtam
 vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ
 dakṣiṇe tu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavanti hyarthasādhakāḥ
 viparītāstu piṭakā moghāstu bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ
 yathoktānāṃ ca saṃdhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ
 siddhā dhruvā vraṇā bhidyāstathā sadyaḥkṛtāśca ye
 dharmakīlasamāścaiva sarve te piṭakāḥ smṛtāḥ
 guṇadoṣāśca sarveṣāṃ tathāpyanye prakīrtitāḥ
 ityāha bhagavāṃstriśaṅkuḥ śiṣyebhyo nityadarśanam
 na nakhena na śastreṇa nāyasena kathaṃcana
 kāñcanena suvarṇena dahedviprāṃśca bhojayet
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyanāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavān
 svapnādhyāyaḥ
 śubhāśubhaṃ ca svapnānām yatphalaṃ samudāhṛtam
 devatābrāhmaṇau gāvau vahniṃ prajvalitaṃ tathā
 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate
 yastu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam
 suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ caiva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate
 sārasāṃśca śukān haṃsān krauñjāñ śvetāṃśca pakṣiṇaḥ
 yastu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate
 samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca
 padminīṃ puṣpitāṃ cāpi pūrṇakumbhāṃstathaiva ca
 prasannamudakaṃ caiva puṣpāṇi vividhāni ca
 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate
 pāṇau pāde 'tha vā jānau śastreṇa dhanuṣāpi vā
 prahārā yasya dīyante tasyāmbaro 'bhivardhate
 tārācandramasau sūryaṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃstathā
 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate
 aśvapṛṣṭhaṃ gajaskandham yānāni śayanāni ca
 yo 'bhirohati svapnānte mahadaiśvaryamāpnuyāt
 patitaścāruhed bhūyastatrasthaśca vibudhyate
 eśvaryadhanalābhāya naṣṭalābhāya nirdiśet
 goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo 'bhirohati
 tatrasthaśca vibudhyeta eśvaryamadhigacchati
 prapātaṃ parvataṃ caiva yo 'bhirohati mānavaḥ
 tatrasthaśca vibudhyeta eśvaryamadhigacchati
 āsane śayane yāne teṣāmārohaṇātkṣayaḥ
 yeṣāmārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ teṣāmārohaṇātkṣayaḥ
 yeṣāmārohaṇāddoṣāsteṣāmārohaṇād guṇāḥ
 trisāhasraṃ bhavetkaṇṭhe daśa śīrṣasya cchedane
 rājyaṃ śatasahasraṃ vā labhate śīrṣabhakṣaṇe
 śuṣkāṃ nadīṃ hradaṃ vāpi śūnyāgārapraveśanam
 śuṣkodapānaṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam
 śṛgālaṃ mānuṣaṃ nagnaṃ godhāvṛścikasūkaram
 ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhikleśaṃ vinirdiśet
 kākaṃ śyenamulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vāpyatha vartakam
 mayūraṃ paśyataḥ svapne tasya vyasanamādiśet
 nagnaṃ paśyati hyātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastameva vā
 kardamenopaliptaṃ vā vyādhikleśamavāpnuyāt
 kuṣṭhāḥ striyo 'tha saṃlokya caurān dyūtakarāṃstathā
 kuśīlāṃścāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam
 vamimūtrapurīṣāṇi virekaṃ vasāno janaḥ
 udvartanaṃ vā kurvāṇaḥ svapnānte rogamarcchati
 dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapnānte yasya dhāryate
 tatrastho 'pi vibudhyeta mahadaiśvaryamādiśet
 antraistu yasya nagaraṃ samantātparivāryate
 grasate candrasūryau tu mahadaiśvaryamādiśet
 manuṣyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ vā svapnānte grasate yadi
 hradaśca vā samudro 'yaṃ mahadaiśvaryamāpnuyāt
 dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śastraṃ raktamābharaṇaṃ dhvajam
 kavacaṃ vā labhetsvapne dhanalābhaṃ vinirdiśet
 prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam
 toraṇaṃ nagaraṃ dvāraṃ candrādityau satārakau
 svapne prapatitau dṛṣṭvā rājñāṃ vyasanamādiśet
 udayaṃ candrasūryāṇāṃ svapne dṛṣṭaṃ praśasyate
 tayorastaṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājño vyasanamādiśet
 śmaśānavṛkṣayūpaṃ vā naro yadyabhirohati
 valmīkaṃ bhasmarāśiṃ vā svapne vyasanamādiśet
 kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naram
 karavīrasrajā svapne tadantaṃ tasya jīvitam
 tamasi praviśet svapne śambhorvā cāmaraṃ tathā
 vṛkṣādvā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 vṛkṣaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vāpi virucam yastu paśyati
 svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 devo vā varṣate yatra yatra caivāśaniḥ patet
 bhūmirvā kampate yatra svapne vyasanamādiśet
 candradityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati
 patitau patamānau vā cakṣustasya vinaśyati
 kāṣāyaprāvṛtāṃ muṇḍāṃ nārīṃ malinavāsasam
 nīlaraktāmbarāṃ dṛṣṭvā āyāsamadhigacchati
 trapusīse ayastāmraloharajatamañjanam
 labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhananāśaṃ samarcchati
 gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate
 vāditravādyamānairvā āyāsaṃ tatra nirdiśet
 kardame yadi vā paṅke sikatāsvavasīdati
 tatrastho vā vibudhyeta vyādhiṃ samadhigacchati
 aṣṭāpadairathānyairvā krīḍejjayaparājaye
 krīḍedakuśalāṅkairvā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ kaliḥ
 āsane śayane yāne vastre sābharaṇe gṛhe
 naṣṭe bhraṣṭe viśīrṇe vā āyāsamadhigacchati
 surāmaireyapānāni śārkaramāsavaṃ madhu
 pibate puruṣaḥ svapne āyāsamadhigacchati
 prasanne 'mbhasi cādarśe chāyāṃ paśyati nātmanaḥ
 utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandhanyāso na saṃśayaḥ
 abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśumathāpi vā
 aṅgāraṃ vāpi varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet
 janaghātaṃ vijānīyāttatra deśe mahābhayam
 rajjujālena vā svapne paracakrād vinirdiśet
 udakena samantādvai nagaraṃ parivāryate
 jālenānyena vā svapne paracakrodgamo bhavet
 tailakardamaliptāṅgo raktakaṇṭhaguṇo naraḥ
 gāyate hasate caiva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet
 yaṃ kṛṣṇavasanā nārī ārdrā vā malinātha vā
 pariṣvajennaraṃ svapne bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 kṛṣṇasārpo yadi svapne hyabhirohati yaṃ naram
 gātrāṇi veṣṭayedvāpi bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 latābhiḥ sthāṇuvṛndairvā yantrairvā parivāryate
 svapnānte puruṣo yastu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 yantrāṇi yadi sarvāṇi vāgurābandhanāni vā
 yasya cchidyeran svapnānte bandhanātsa vimucyate
 viṣamāṇi ca niṃnāni parvatānnagarāṇi ca
 yastu paśyati svapnānte kṣipraṃ kleśādvimucyate
 pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinātha vā
 evamrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ
 susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śuklavāsasam
 puruṣaṃ vātha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahatsukham
 tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣamatho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍham yatra dṛśyate
 gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravyakṣayo bhavet
 bhadrāsane vābhyāsīno śayane vā susaṃskṛte
 naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naram
 naraḥ śuklamatho vastraṃ śuklagandhānulepitam
 svapnānte yastu paśyeta strīlābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 yastu hyannāni paśyeta bhūṣaṇaṃ nigaḍaistathā
 narastu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patim
 mekhalāṃ karṇikāṃ mālāṃ strīṇāmābharaṇāni ca
 labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patim
 kuñjaraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ nāgaṃ candrādityau satārakau
 abhivandeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate 'cirāt
 eṣāmanyatamaḥ kukṣau praviśecca yadi striyāḥ
 sā kāle sarvapūrṇāṅgaṃ śrīmatputraṃ prasūyate
 phalāni ca samagrāṇi vanāni haritāni ca
 svapnānte labhate nārī śrīmatputraṃ prasūyate
 utpalaṃ kumudaṃ padmaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sakuḍmalam
 labdhvā nārī tu svapnānte śrīmatputraṃ prasūyate
 upāyanasūtrayorantaḥ sajjaṃ tatra tu piṇḍakam
 svapne yā labhate nārī sāpi putraṃ prasūyate
 yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ cāpi yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate
 mlāyantīmatha grīṣmānte taruṇīmātmikāmapi
 śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣamaraṇaṃ bhavet
 bāhavo yasya vardhante cakṣuraṅgulayopi vā
 jñātayastasya vardhante śatrūṇāṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet
 badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuśca vyākulaṃ bhavet
 bāhurvā prapatedyasya svapakṣamaraṇaṃ bhavet
 devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā
 svapne prayacchate yasyāḥ putrastasyāḥ prajāyate
 apakṛṣṭo rudan yo vā nagno 'tha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ
 krodhaṃ vā  vinirdiśet
 carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vātha kilāṭakam
 svapne labdhvā ca prāpnujānīyād dhruvaṃ vastrāgamo bhavet
 amānuṣo 'tha rājā vā devaḥ preto 'tha brāhmaṇaḥ
 svapne yathā te jalpante sa tathārtho bhaviṣyati
  pūrvavicintitam
 yaccānusmarate dṛṣṭvā yaccāpi bahu paśyati
 abhyutthito yathā mārge svapnānte pratibudhyate
 viṣamaṃ vā tathādhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate
 agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate
 gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate
 nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ samedhaṃ na praśasyate
 prasannamudakaṃ śastaṃ kaluṣaṃ na praśasyate
 adhvānaṃ gamanaṃ śastaṃ na kvacitsaṃnivartanam
 suvarṇadarśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate
 māṃsasya darśanaṃ sādhu bhakṣaṇaṃ na praśasyate
 madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate
 pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate
 yānasyārohaṇaṃ śāstaṃ patanaṃ na praśasyate
 svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate
 pracchannadarśanaṃ śastaṃ nagnaṃ naiva praśasyate
 mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate
 gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate
 mṛduḥ praśasyate vāto nātivātaḥ praśasyate
 vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate
 parvatārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ na tu tatrāvatāraṇam
 dhūmrā ghanā dundubhiśaṅkhaśabdo vāto 'bhravṛṣṭiśca tathā samantāt
 sarvasthirāṇāṃ ca calaśca yaḥ syādye cāntare doṣakṛtā vikārāḥ
 pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvadiṣṭā rājarṣayo devagaṇāśca sarve
 yad brāhmaṇa gātravikartanaṃ ca etāni sarvāṇyapi śobhanāni
 yatpūrvarūpeṣu bhavetpraśastaṃ duḥsvapnametāni śamaṃ nayanti
 gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvijapūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnametena parājitaṃ syāt
 devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyastaṃ tu parāṃścārcayitum yatena
 svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsarānte 'sya vipākamāhuḥ
 ṣaṇmāsikam yacca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikam yattu bhavet tṛtīye
 adhyardhamāsetarameva yatsyāt phaleccaturthe rajanīprabhāte
 dvijottame vā tilapātradānaṃ śāntikriyāḥ svastyayanaprayogāḥ
 pūjā gurūṇāṃ parimiṣṭamannaṃ duḥsvapnametāni vināśayanti
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapnādhyāyanāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bho puṣkarasārinn aparamapi svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavāṃstriśaṅkuh
 aparaḥ svapnādhyāyaḥ
 śubhāśubhānāṃ svapnānām yatphalaṃ samudāhṛtam
 nimittam yādṛśam yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
 jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati
 na tu bhayaṃ bhavettasya jānīyādeva buddhimān

 yadi gacchetparājayaḥ
 senā na gacchet
 senāyāṃ vrajamānāyāṃ śivā āgacchedagrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati
 paracakraparājayaṃ ca nivedayati
 sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchatyagrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati
 arthasiddhiṃ tathaiva ca
 puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati
mārgaṃ nivedayati
 tanmāgeṇa hi gantavyaṃ triśaṅkuvacanam yathā
 grāmasya nagarasyāpi caityasthāne tathaiva ca
 pūrveṇottareṇāpi śivā vāśati
kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati
 dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati
yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati
 vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathaiva vidiśāsu ca
 atidīrghātirūkṣā vā kāle māsāntike tathā
 adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅkuvacanam yathā
 madhusvarāṃ śivāṃ jñātvā kāle vele upasthite
 kṣemaṃ caivārthasiddhiśca cintitavyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
 vyādhirupadravāśca
sarvaṃ tu praśamam yānti triśaṅkuvacanam yathā
 śivārutasyopacāro digvidiśāsu nimittā grahītavyāḥ
 yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati
sa divaso jñātavyaḥ
 puṣpagandhamālyopahārastaddivase upapādayitavyaḥ
 nityaṃ devatāgurukeṇa bhavitavyam
 devyā gurukeṇa bhavitavyam
 devyai śuśrūṣā kartavyā
 sarvārthān saṃpādayiṣyati
 sarvakāryāṇi nivedayati
 yatkiṃcitkāryamārabhiṣyati
tatsarvaṃ nivedayati
 devyai sarjaraso guggulu ca dhūpayitavyam
 puṣpabaliśca yathākāle dāpayitavyaḥ
 ityāha bhagavāṃstriśaṅkuḥ
 śivārutakathane 'tra vidyāṃ vakṣyāmi yathāsatyaṃ bhaviṣyati
 nama āraṇyāyai
 cīriṇyai svāhā sarjarasadhūpam
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasāriñ śivārutanāmādhyāyaḥ
 athātaḥ puṣkarasārin pāṇilekhānāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavāṃstriśaṅkuh
 pāṇilekhā
 athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi narāṇāṃ karasāṃsthitam
 lakṣaṇaṃ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
 aṅguṣṭhamūlamāśritya ūrdhvarekhā pravartate
 tatra jātaṃ sukhataraṃ dvitīyā jñānamantare
 tṛtīya sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate
 tatroktā hetavaḥ śāstre samāsena caturvidhāḥ
 aparvasu ca parvāṇi nakṣatrāṇāmupadravaḥ
 dviniḥsṛto viśuddhātmā jīvedvarṣaśataṃ hi saḥ
 triṃśat gtribhāgena jānīyādardhe pañcāśadāyuṣaḥ
 saptatistryaṃśabhāgeṣu atyantānugate śatam
 āyurlekhā pradṛśyaiva vyantarāyaḥ prakāśyate
 nakṣatrasaṃjñayā jñeyā manujairarthaśastathā
 aṅguṣṭhodaramārge tu yāvatyo yasya rājayaḥ
 tasyāpatyāni jānīyāt tāvanti nātra saṃśayaḥ
 dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet
 hrasvāyuṣaṃ vijānīyāddhrasvalekhā tu yā bhavet
 aṅguṣṭhamūle yavako rātrau janmābhinirdiśet
 divā tu janma nirdiṣṭamaṅguṣṭhayavake dhruvam
 avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet
 lagnaṃ puṃsaṃjñako jñeyo 'horātraṃ vinirdiśet
 divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strīsaṃjñako bhavet
 rātriḥ saṃdhyā samākhyātā bhāgairanyair na saṃśayaḥ
 puṃsaṃjñādudayaṃ teṣāmahorātrāntikaṃ vadet
 aṅguṣḍhamūle yavake śale saukhyaṃ vidhīyate
 aśvād bhadraṃ vijānīyādaṅguṣṭhayavakeṣviha
 yavamālā ca matsyaḥ syādaṅguṣṭhayavako ratau
 bālayauvanamadhyānte sukhaṃ tasyābhinirdiśet
 yasya syād yavakaścāpi cāpo vā svastikastathā
 taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyante dhanyāste puruṣā hyamī
 matsyo dhānyaṃ bhaved bhogāyāmiṣādau yave dhanam
 bhogasaubhāgyaṃ jānīyānmīnādau nātra saṃśayaḥ
 patākābhirdhvajairvāpi śaktibhistomaraistathā
 talasthairaṅkuśaiścāpi vijñeyaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
 rājavaṃśaprasūtaṃ ca rājamātraṃ vinirdiśet
 preṣkyante śākhayā pañca haste catvāra eva ca
 kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiścāpi satkṛtaḥ
 vaiśyo 'tha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhanadhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
 śūdro vipulabhāgī syāt parvaśīlo 'tha naiṣṭhikaḥ
 satatamabhipūjyaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃvadaḥ
 viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahustathā
 śyāmavarṇātha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī
 trilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karasthitāḥ
 mahābhogo mahāvidvāñ jīvedvarṣaśataṃ ca saḥ
 ajapadaṃ rājacchatraṃ śaṅkhacakrapuraskṛtam
 taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatim
 bhagastu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākairhastyaśvamālāṅkuśataśca rājā
 matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedistu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ
 anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati
 same tvaśītirvarṣāṇi saptabhiryathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed
 śarīravarṇaprabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇavihīnakāṃ ca
 samīkṣya nīcottamamadhyamānāṃ dāridryamadhye caratāṃ vijānatām
 abhyañjanodvartanasatkarīṣairadhyakṣacurṇaiśca vimṛjya pāṇim
 prakṣālya caikāntaraghṛṣṭalekhāmekāgracittastu karaṃ parīkṣet
 valayasamanarādhipaṃ bhajantyaḥ samanugatā maṇibandhane tu tisraḥ
 dvirapi ca sa bhavāntare mahātmā vipuladhanaśriya āha vastralābhaḥ
 dadati satatamunnatastu pāṇirbhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ
 paripatati śirāviruddhapāṇirdhanamadhigacchati māṃsagūḍhapāṇiḥ
 sudṛśa karatalaiśca sādhavaste kuṭilakṛtairvinimīlitaiśca dhūrtāḥ
 bhavati rudhirasaṃnibhaḥ suraktaściramiha piṇḍitapāṇirīśvaraḥ syāt
 dhṛtaruciramanāḥ śilāravindairjvalanakaṣāyasuvarṇapāṇirājih
 bhavati bahudhano nigūḍhapāṇiściramiha jīvati pānabhogabhogī
 subhaga iha tathoṣṇadīrghapāṇirdhruvamiha śītalapāṇikastu ṣaṇḍhaḥ
 iha hi bahudhano balena yuktaḥ sutanususaṃcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ
 dhanamupanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛtajanitā jalavacca yā sudīrghā
 jalavadanugatā suvarṇavarṇā dhanamadhigacchati niṃnaśonnatā yā
 dhanamupalabhate suraktapāṇirvipulamatho ca nirantarāṅguliḥ syāt
 balipuruṣamapi tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā 
ca viśīrṇavarṇalekhā
 apagataghṛtavarṇapāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ
 asubhṛtisadṛśā bhavettathā bhūṣaṇavṛta rūpavatī subhā ekabhāryā
 bhavati bahudhano dhanairvihīnaḥ śrutamadhigamya viśālapāṇilekhaḥ
 suṛjubhirahinīlanirmalābhih karatalarāji bhirīśvaraḥ sa dhanyah
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin karatalalekhānāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavāṃstriśaṅkuḥ
 namo 'rhatām
 teṣāṃ namaskṛtvā
 vāyasarutam
 idaṃ śāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi vāyasānāṃ śubhāśubham
 jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva lābhālābhaṃ tathaiva ca
 sukhaduḥkhaṃ priyāpriyaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
 vāyasānāṃ vacaḥsiddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvidhi
 devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namo namaḥ
 āgatā mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ vāyasā balibhojanāḥ
 prasthitasya yadādhvānamagrato vāyaso bhavet
 vyāharan kṣīrivṛkṣastho nirdiśedarthasiddhitām
 svareṇa parituṣṭena phalavṛkṣasamāśritaḥ
 punarāgamanaṃ caiva siddhamarthaniveditam
 vivṛddhavṛkṣapatrāṇi madhuraṃ cānuvāsati
 asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasam
 dṛṣṭastu tuṇḍapādena ātmanaḥ parimārjati
 pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ tatra vidyānna saṃśayaḥ
 rūkṣaṃ nirgharṣate tuṇḍaṃ śiraśca parimārjati
 saphalaṃ vṛkṣamāsthāya dhruvaṃ māṃsena bhojanam
 locayati vyāharati phalavṛkṣasamāśritaḥ
 vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanam
 ghoraṃ vyāharate kāryaṃ vāyaso vṛkṣamāśritaḥ
 kalahaṃ saṃgrāmabhayaṃ tatra vidyānna saṃśayaḥ
 śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet
 kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati
 kṣīrivṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet
 krameṇa yugamātreṇa na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyate
 śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā 'kāmukākam' pravāśati
 tatkṣaṇaṃ saṃnivedeti tatra caurabhayaṃ bhavet
 śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā 'kāmukākam' pravāśati
 pṛṣṭhena darśayedbhāraṃ kṣudhāpīḍāṃ ca nirdiśet
 pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati
 na tatra gamanaṃ kuryāccauraiḥ pathamupadrutam
 rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vāpi yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ
 na tatra gamanaṃ śreyaścauraiḥ pathamupadrutam
 gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ
 kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati
 tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayecca sadā khagaḥ
 purataḥ śuṣkapāṇistu tatra caurabhayaṃ bhavet
 sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet
 nipatet sārthamadhye 'smiṃś caurasainyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
 yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ
 śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā tatra vidyānmahābhayam
 bhītastrastaḥ parītaśca yastu vyāharate khagaḥ
 paribādhan diśaḥ sarvāstatra bhayamupasthitam
 gacchantaṃ samanugacchetpuraḥ sthitvā tu vyāharet
 na tatra gamanaṃ kuryānmārgamatra praśātanam
 vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet
 vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛhasvāminām
 śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ
 dūrādabhyāgataṃ jñātvā prasiddhiṃ cābhinirdiśet
 gargare ghaṭake caiva sthālikapiṭhareṣu vā
 niṣaṇṇo vāśati kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvam
 āsane śayane vāpi sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ
 prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ brūyātproṣitena samāgamaḥ
 brahmasthāne niṣīditvā dhruvaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ
 arthalābhaṃ vijānīyāddhanalābhaṃ ca ākaret
 brahmasthāne niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ vāśati
 saṃdhisthāne hareccaurastatra vai nāsti saṃśayaḥ
 devatādevatānāṃ ca devasyopavanāni ca
 yasya vācaṃ vadettasya arthalābhaṃ vinirdiśet
 lākṣāharidrāmañjiṣṭhāharitālamanaḥśilāḥ
 yasyāharetpurastasya svarṇalābhaṃ vinirdiśet
 pātraṃ ca pātrakaṃ caiva mṛttikāvarabhājanam
 yasya yasya harettasya dravyalābhaṃ vinirdiśet
 saṃghībhūtvā yugamātraṃ śubhaṃ tiṣṭhati vāyasaḥ
 kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛhamāropayanti ca
 nigadantyatra vijānīyād yācakāttu mahābhayam
 nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca
 nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet
 grāmānte bhayamākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvam
 pratyekato vā vāśati vidyāttatra mahābhayam
 vāyaso 'stha gṛhītvā vai pragacchedanudakṣiṇam
 niṣīdan saphale vṛkṣe sa vadenmāṃsabhojanam
 yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ
 abhyantare saptarātrānmaraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet
 karake codake caiva snigdhadeśeṣu vāśati
 ūrdhvamukhaṃ nirīkṣaṃstu jagad vṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet
 svareṇa parituṣṭena tīrthavṛkṣeṣu vāśati
 ūrdhvamukhaṃ tathā vakti vātavṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet
 kāyaṃ kilakilāyaṃstu snigdhadeśeṣu vāśati
 vakṣo vidhunvan vāyasaḥ sadyo vṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet
 svareṇa parituṣṭena snigdhaṃ madhuraṃ vāśati
 sakṣarasadravaṃ bhāgaṃ vāśati bhojanaṃ bhavet
 prakāre toraṇāgre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ
 abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet
 maṇḍalāni vāvartāni bahirvā nagarasya ca
 vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra caiva vinirdiśet
 grāme vā nagare vāpi kurvate yatra maṇḍalam
 ūrdhvamukhaṃ vāśanto vai viṣaṇṇatvaṃ samutthitam
 pūrveṇa caiva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī
 alpodakenotplavanti vanāni nagarāṇi ca
 purastāddakṣiṇe pārśve yadi sūyati vāyasī
 varṣati prathame māse paścāddevo na varṣati
 kṛṣṭadhānyāni vardhante māṣadhānyaṃ vinaśyati
 dakṣiṇe vṛkṣaśikhare yadā sūyati vāyasī
 maṇḍūkakīṭakamakṣā cauraśca bahulībhavet
 paścimottarapāśva tu yadā sūyati vāyasī
 aśanir nipatettatra bhayaṃ ca mṛgapakṣiṇām
 uttare vṛkṣaśikhare yadā sūyati vāyasī
 pūrvamuptaṃ vijānīyācchasyaṃ samupajāyate
 upari vṛkṣaśikhare yadā sūyati vāyasī
 alpodakaṃ vijānīyātsthale bījāni ropayet
 yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī
 madhyaṃ varṣate varṣaṃ madhyaśasyaṃ prajāyate
 skandhamūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī
 anāvṛṣṭirbhaved ghorā durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet
 caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī
 subhikṣaṃ ca bhavettatra phalānāmuditaṃ bhavet
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutaṃ nāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuh
 dvāralakṣaṇam
 mohendramatha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtam
 dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryameva ca
 sugrīvaṃ puṣpadantaṃ ca paścimenātra nirdiśet
 bhallātakaṃ rājayakṣmaṃ vidyāduttarataḥ śubham
 janmasampadvipatkṣetrakṣemapratyarisādhanam
 atha vai dhanamitraṃ ca paramaṃ mairameva ca
 uvāca vidhivatprājño viśvakarmā mahāmatiḥ
 vāstūnāṃ guṇadoṣau ca pravakṣyāmyanupūrvaśaḥ
 samaṃ syāccaturasraṃ ca vistīrṇā caiva mṛttikā
 kṣīrivṛkṣākulaṃ dhanyaṃ brāhmaṇasya praśasyate
 pūrvāyatanatayā vāstu rathacakrākṛti ca yat
 raktapāṃśurbhavedyatra rājñāṃ tattu praśasyate
 trikoṇaṃ kuśasaṃstrīrṇamuttānaṃ madhuraṃ ca yat
 vyāyamato jalaṃ caiva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī
 aṅgārākārasaṃsthānaṃ gomukhaṃ śakaṭākṛti
 anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktam yacca putrakṣayāvaham
 yattu kañjarakakṣaistat tyaktaṃ varṣodakena ca
 apasavyodakaṃ caiva dūrataḥ parivarjayet
 viprasya caturasraṃ tu kṣātriyaṃ parimaṇḍalam
 daśadvādaśakaṃ vaiśye śūdrasya tatra lekhanam
 vāstupūrvottare deśe gokulaṃ tatra kārayet
 tathaiva cāgniśālāṃ tu pūrvadakṣiṇato diśi
 varṣavṛṣyāyudhāgārān dakṣiṇena niveśayet
 paścimottarataścātra vaṇigbhāṇḍaṃ niveśayet
 uttarāyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ varcaḥsthānamanuttaram
 eśānyāmeva sarvāṇi prāsādaśca puromukhaḥ
 avidhiparivarteta tatra vairaṃ vadho bhavet
 racitasarvadvārāṇāmāyāmo dviguṇo mataḥ
 kuryātsurabhavanānām yatheṣṭaṃ dvārakāṇyapi
 taddvārabāhuparyante striyo dṛṣṭā doṣāvahāḥ
 vidviṣasya salokasya dvāre syānnu karagraha
 mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā
 satye mṛdurmṛgo śūro 'ntarīkṣe dhanakṣayaḥ
 vāyavye tu bahuvyādhirbhage bhāgyaviparyayaḥ
 puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe 'pyaśubho bhavet
 śoke bhūtavikāraḥ syāt śoṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā
 bhallātake gṛhe vāso rājayakṣme samāvṛtiḥ
 hrade reṇupariśrāva āditye tu kalirdhruvam
 nāgarāje nāgabhayaṃ mahaśced dīrghamāyuṣam
 bhavedasya ca yad dvāraṃ tatrāgnibhayamādiśet
 kṣayaṃ vidyāttasya tasya dhanasya kulasya ca
 yame mṛtyuṃ vijānīyātkule śreṣṭhottamasya ca
 bhṛṅgirāje tu matimān gandharve gandhamālyatā
 bhṛṅge krodhaḥ kaliścaiva pitari bhogasampadaḥ
 dauvārike svalpadhanaṃ sugrīve rājapūjitaḥ
 puṣpadante dhanāvāptirvaruṇe jalacitratā
 asure maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahudoṣatā
 baliṃśca upahārāṃśca pravakṣyāmi yathāgṛham
 vicitrairvidiśairgandhaiḥ paripūjya baliṃ haret
 kalatre hetubījāni madhyame 'rjitameva tu
 mahendre muktapuṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi
 āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ caiva priyaṅgavaḥ
 antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca
 nandā pratipadā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā
 tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryātprājño hyevaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
 ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaḥ
 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśarāśikaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi
 tacchrūyatām
 atha kim
 kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuh
 dvādaśarāśikaḥ
 ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi cittavijñānakāṇḍakam
 yathādṛṣṭāntenaivenaṃ narāṇāṃ samudāhṛtam
 tadahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi cittavijñānamuttamam
 dvādaśaiva tu cittāste ye loke pracaranti vai
 tānahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ
 dvādaśaiva tu kuryācca maṇḍalāni vicakṣaṇaḥ
 prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
 tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ cāpi karkaṭaḥ
 pañcamaṃ cāpi siṃhastu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtam
 tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikastu tathāṣṭamam
 dhanvī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ
 kumbhaścaikādaśaṃ jñeyo dvādaśaṃ mīna ucyate
 horā śarīraṃ jātasya dvitīye cintitaṃ dhanam
 tṛtīye bhrātaraścaiva caturthe svajanastathā
 cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā
 saptame dārasamyogo hyaṣṭame naidhanaṃ smṛtam
 navame cintyate dharmo daśame karmajaṃ phalam
 ekādaśe cārthalābho dvādaśe vyarthasambhavaḥ
 ete dvādaśa cittāstu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ
 sarvabhūtātmabhūtāśca yathājñeyāsta dehinām
